hero.title: Candelaria Solar Car
hero.subtitle: Interdisciplinary research focused on innovation, impact, and global outreach.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to build a fully functional solar car capable of competing in the Australian challenge.

roles.charge1: Director of the Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering.
roles.charge2: Associate Professor at the Department of Mechanical Engineering.

objectives.description1: Ensure that each area advances according to the schedule and defined quality standards.
objectives.description2: Guide the overall direction of the project through effective and collaborative management.
objectives.description3: Act as the main liaison between the project, the university, and external entities.

objectives.description1: Ensure the availability and proper distribution of supplies for all teams.
objectives.description2: Maintain control of purchases, documentation, and internal project expenses.
objectives.description3: Optimize logistics processes to increase group efficiency.

roles.role1: Team Leader and Internal Communication Coordinator.

objectives.description1: Care for and strengthen the project’s human talent.
objectives.description2: Accompany the group through tools that encourage personal and professional growth.
objectives.description3: Ensure internal visibility and value individual and collective achievements.

objectives.objective1: Define the vehicle’s internal and external aesthetics:
objectives.description1: Develop an innovative and functional visual concept that ensures harmony between design, engineering, and project identity.
objectives.description2: Design attire that reinforces the institutional image and strengthens team cohesion.
objectives.objective3: Create graphic pieces for group identity:
objectives.description3: Produce visual materials that enable clear, impactful, and consistent communication for Project Candelaria.

objectives.description1: Design and implement an intelligent system for energy control and administration.
objectives.description2: Choose panels and batteries that maximize the vehicle’s efficiency.
objectives.description3: Analyze energy performance under different operating conditions.

objectives.description1: Integrate hardware and software for data acquisition and processing.
objectives.description2: Select and evaluate motors and batteries through performance testing.
objectives.description3: Ensure that all systems operate efficiently and in coordination.

objectives.objective1: Design a safe and efficient structure:
objectives.description1: Develop the chassis and bodywork with criteria of strength and lightness.
objectives.description2: Analyze and validate airflow to maximize efficiency and performance.
objectives.objective3: Refine the surface and shape of the fairing:
objectives.description3: Adjust proportions and materials to achieve a balance between aesthetics and functionality.
